entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023
